sections.summary: advanced desktop support lead/manager with 14 plus years of experience in the information technology field providing tier ii - iii technical support. i have demonstrated highly advanced troubleshooting techniques in resolving end-user issues with swift efficiency and going above and beyond sla. 15 plus years of experience working with united senate end-users across multiple technological platforms.
